tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE energy_improvement (
    improvement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    process_id INT,
    improvement_description TEXT,
    improvement_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (process_id) REFERENCES energy_consumption(process_id)
);

CREATE TABLE energy_consumption_analysis (
    analysis_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    process_id INT NOT NULL REFERENCES manufacturing_processes(process_id),
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE NOT NULL,
    total_energy_consumed DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    analysis_result TEXT
);
